title: Sneak Attack (Melee)
content: ly attacking when you don't have Advantage. Some ways to get Advantage so your Sneak Attack can be executed: Attacking a target while hidden or invisible. Attacking a Prone or Sleeping creature within 3m. Attacking an enemy that is Blinded, Entangled or Paralyzed. As of Patch #1: You can Sneak Attack with Spell Attacks requiring an Attack Roll to determine whether you hit, e.g. Shocking Grasp or Eldritch Blast.
